pages.disclaimers: SeatShield - Disclaimers Regarding Premium Car Seat Covers SeatShield HOME ABOUT US Products Contact Disclaimers **SeatShield disclaims the following:** **SeatShield is not affiliated with any ticket marketplace or event organizer.** We provide a platform to facilitate seat transfers between fans, but we are not responsible for the validity of tickets or the actions of other users. **SeatShield does not guarantee the successful transfer of seats.** Transfers are subject to approval by the original ticket holder and may be denied for any reason. **SeatShield is not responsible for any financial loss incurred as a result of using our platform.** This includes, but is not limited to, fraudulent tickets, event cancellations, or changes in event details. **You agree to use SeatShield at your own risk.** By using our platform, you agree to these disclaimers and our Terms of Service. **Additional Disclaimers:** SeatShield reserves the right to modify these disclaimers at any time. Your continued use of the platform following the posting of changes to these disclaimers will be deemed your acceptance of those changes. If any provision of these disclaimers is held to be invalid or unenforceable, such provision shall be struck and the remaining provisions shall remain in full force and effect. pages.privacy-policy: SeatShield - Privacy Policy for Premium Car Seat Covers SeatShield HOME ABOUT US Products Contact Privacy Policy SeatShield takes the privacy of its users seriously. This Privacy Policy describes the information we collect from users, how we use that information, and the steps we take to protect it. Information We Collect Personal Information: When you create an account or make a purchase on SeatShield, we may collect certain personal information from you, such as your name, email address, billing address, and shipping address. Non-Personal Information: We may also collect non-personal information about your use of the SeatShield platform, such as your browsing history and IP address. This information is used to improve our website and services. How We Use Your Information We use your personal information to process your orders, send you account-related communications, and provide customer support. We may use your non-personal information to improve our website and services, personalize your experience, and send you marketing communications (with your consent). Information Sharing and Disclosure We will not share your personal information with third parties without your consent, except as necessary to fulfill your orders or comply with the law. We may share non-personal information with third-party service providers who help us operate our website and business. Data Security We take steps to protect your information from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure. However, no website or internet transmission is completely secure. We cannot guarantee the security of your information. Your Choices You can access and update your personal information by logging into your account. You can unsubscribe from marketing communications by following the instructions in the emails we send you. Changes to this Privacy Policy We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will post any changes on our website. The SeatShield website uses cookies to ensure you have the best experience on our site. Accept or Decline.
